data.name: Baldur's Gate II: Enhanced Edition Official Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Baldur's Gate II: Enhanced Edition Official Soundtrack

Composers Michael Hoenig, Inon Zur, Howard Drossin, and Sam Hulick

Experience the unforgettable original soundtracks for Baldur's Gate II and Throne of Bhaal composed by Michael Hoenig, Inon Zur, and Howard Drossin, plus 15 new tracks by Sam Hulick.

All 81 tracks (Including 34 that have previously never been released) are provided in both MP3 and lossless FLAC format, for your listening pleasure. Total Length: 113 min, 50 sec

Track List


01. Main Title
02. Jon Battle and Peace
03. Gaelan Bayle Sailing
04. Asylum Journey
05. Underdark
06. City Gates
07. Trademeet
08. Waukeen's Promenade

52. Irenicus Final Battle

57. Saradush Under Siege (ToB)

64. Sendai's Enclave (ToB)
65. The Mana Forge (ToB)
66. Melissan Battle (ToB)
67. The Hidden Refuge (BGII:EE)
68. Raid on the Red Wizards (BGII:EE)
69. Our Haven is Lost (BGII:EE)
70. Neera's Final Confrontation (BGII:EE)
71. Rendezvous at Dusk (BGII:EE)

data.short_description: Experience the unforgettable original soundtracks for Baldur's Gate II and Throne of Bhaal composed by Michael Hoenig, Inon Zur, and Howard Drossin, plus 15 new tracks by Sam Hulick. All 81 tracks are provided in both MP3 and lossless FLAC format, for your listening pleasure.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: 1 GHZ
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible
  • Storage: 822 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.8 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or equivalent
  • Storage: 822 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or equivalent
  • Storage: 822 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires Steam Run-Time
